delhi.name: India Gate
delhi.description: A war memorial dedicated to soldiers of World War I and the Third Anglo-Afghan War.

delhi.name: Qutub Minar
delhi.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site, the tallest brick minaret in the world.

delhi.name: Red Fort
delhi.description: Historic fort and former residence of Mughal emperors.

mumbai.name: Gateway of India
mumbai.description: Iconic arch monument overlooking the Arabian Sea.

mumbai.name: Marine Drive
mumbai.description: A scenic coastal road with sweeping views of Mumbai's skyline.

mumbai.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus
mumbai.description: Victorian Gothic-style railway station and UNESCO site.

jaipur.name: Hawa Mahal
jaipur.description: Palace of Winds, famous for its intricate lattice facade.

jaipur.name: City Palace
jaipur.description: Complex of courtyards, gardens, and buildings blending Rajasthani and Mughal architecture.

varanasi.name: Kashi Vishwanath
varanasi.description: Sacred temple complex dedicated to Lord Vishwanath.

varanasi.name: Dashashwamedh Ghat
varanasi.description: Riverfront pilgrimage site and one of the holiest ghats in Varanasi.

varanasi.name: Sarnath Temple
varanasi.description: Ancient Buddhist monastery and UNESCO World Heritage Site.
